<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Toppling Dance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1435) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Dance Underfoot](/Feats.aspx?ID=1433)

</column>

---

While sharing a creature's space using Dance Underfoot, your weapons and unarmed attacks gain the [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) trait, but only against the creature whose space you share. You can be in the same space as a Large or larger [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) creature, even if it's not your ally.
name: Toppling Dance
